name: Quick Mini Games - Mine Sweeper, Snake and More
name_original: Quick Mini Games - Mine Sweeper, Snake and More
description:
Quick Mini Games started as a way for us to collect some money to support our current game project in development. However, it eventually evolved into a full-fledged fun project itself. We hope you will enjoy all the games it has and share with your friends too.
And, yes it offers Apple Watch support as well. Cheers.
